alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 9:14PM CDT until May 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Arkansas... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Bienville, Webster and Bossier Parishes. Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill affecting Webster and Columbia Parishes. Bayou Dorcheat At Lake Bistineau affecting Bienville, Webster, Red River and Bossier Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Expect minor lowland flooding with the boat ramp suffering overflow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon and continue falling to 13.2 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 915 PM CDT.
